text: Balázs Birtalan (October 12, 1969. - May 14, 2016) was a Hungarian author, poet, publicist, psychotherapist and activist. He was mostly known for his activism in the gay Christian movement in Hungary. He was the son of the poet Ferenc Birtalan. He was born in Budapest. He was gay.Port.hu Birtalan died on May 14, 2016, aged 46.MEGHALT BIRTALAN BALÁZS ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2016 deaths Category:LGBT rights activists Category:Gay men Category:LGBT poets Category:Writers from Budapest Category:Hungarian poets
title: Balázs Birtalan
